DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is the comparision between the effects of vitamin D or placebo supplementation for 2 months in serum level of thioredoxin, TBP-2 and thioredoxin reductase activity in patients with type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: the Effect of Vitamin D on the Serum Thioredoxin, TBP-2, Thioredoxin Reductase, Gene Expression of TBP-2 in Patients With Type II Diabetes
DOC.criteria: literate, willingness to participation, diabetic patients 30 60 years old, body mass index in the range 18.5 35, avoidance of dietary supplements, vitamins and herbal products at least 3 months before and throughout the intervention people who have used vitamin D supplements in last 3 months, having chronic renal disease , GI disease, Hepatobilliary diseases, hematological disorders, hypo or hyperthyroidism, treatment with orlistat or sibutramine for weight loss, pregnancy and lactation, treatment with insulin or Thiazolidinediones, Smokers
